original_title: Kelly the Coed 12: Mommy's Little Monster
overview: Kelly decides to bring a few of her college friends home to meet her parents and ends up in big trouble. How was she supposed to know that her house would be overrun with over-sexed fratboys and an all-out orgy would ensue? It's a good thing that her friend Christie the campus slut is there to calm her dad down!
title: Kelly the Coed 12: Mommy's Little Monster
